actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Committee on Public Works and Transportation discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations for the Minidoka project located at the Minidoka Dam on the Snake River in Minidoka, Cassia, and Blaine Counties, Idaho.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility investigations of certain potential water resource developments.
